name: Fail to login into the Saucedemo store due to invalid credentials.
scenarioId: sauceDemo:Fail to login into the Saucedemo store due to invalid credentials.
methodName: Fail to login into the Saucedemo store due to invalid credentials.

testSteps.description: Given I am on the Saucedemo login page

children.description: Ricardo opens the Souce demo page
Ricardo enters 'standard_user' into Text Box username
Ricardo enters 'secret_sauc' into Text Box password
Ricardo clicks on Link to loggin

testSteps.description: Then I can see an error message and I cannot access the store

children.description: Then validation for should be a string containing 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service'

userStory.storyName: Login into saucedemo, add items to the shopping cart, remove products, and check the number of items in the cart.
userStory.displayName: Login into saucedemo, add items to the shopping cart, remove products, and check the number of items in the cart.
userStory.narrative:
As a client I want to login into saucedemo store to explore and buy products
	As a client I want to be able to add products to my shopping cart to select the products to buy
	As a client I want to be able to remove products from my shopping cart to remove products i don't want to buy

title: Fail to login into the Saucedemo store due to invalid credentials.
